item.title: My bookshelf
item.author: Author
item.description: My bookshelf Here’s my virtual bookshelf: a list of books I’ve been reading lately and books I wish to read in the future! This is mostly for personal records, but maybe you can get inspired by some of the books in the list! Also, I’m always open to new suggestions, so contact me if you have one! Now reading ðŸ“– : Il mondo sottosopra, by Massimo Polidoro. To read Thinking, Fast and Slow, by Daniel Kahneman.

item.title: Welcome to my blog!
item.author: Author
item.description: Welcome to my blog! Here I will try to publish interesting content about my research, thoughts and experiences! See you soon!
